  • Method Details

    • bioPlaceLists

      public String bioPlaceLists()
      Description: Generates a formatted list of biological places with their names and areas.
      Returns:
      A string containing the formatted list of biological places.

    • communityLists

      public String communityLists()
      Description: Generates a formatted list of Communities with their names and representant name.
      Returns:
      A string containing the formatted list of Communities.

    • showBioPlace

      public String showBioPlace(String placeName)
      Description: This method here displays the toString() method of the class BioPlace through this method.
      Parameters:
      placeName - name of the BioPlace to show. pre: A BioPlace object should exist in order to display it's information attributes.
      Returns:
      The toString() method of the BioPlace class according to the query is displayed.

    • registerCommunity

      public boolean registerCommunity(String communityName, int race, int inhabitants, String representantName, String representantNumber, int[] issues)
      Description: Registers a new community with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      communityName - The name of the community.
      race - The race of the community (1 for Afrodescendant, 2 for Indigenous, 3 for Raizal).
      inhabitants - The number of inhabitants in the community.
      representantName - The name of the community's representative.
      representantNumber - The contact number of the community's representative.
      issues - An array of integers representing major issues in the community: 1 for absence of hospitals, 2 for lack of education services, 3 for lack of drinkable water services, 4 for access absence of basic alimentation.
      Returns:
      true if the community is successfully registered, false if the community already exists or storage is full.

    • registerProductToCommunity

      public boolean registerProductToCommunity(String communityName, String productName, double productPercentage, int productType, boolean handMade)
      Description: Registers a product to a community's inventory.
      Parameters:
      communityName - The name of the community to which the product will be registered.
      productName - The name of the product to register.
      productPercentage - The percentage of the product's contribution to the community.
      productType - The type of the product (e.g., food, craft, etc.).
      handMade - true if the product is handmade, false otherwise.
      Returns:
      true if the product is successfully registered to the community, false otherwise (community not found).

    • deleteProductOfCommunity

      public boolean deleteProductOfCommunity(String communityName, String productName)
      Description: Deletes a product from a community's inventory. pre: The Method deleteProductOfCommunity must be initialized in the Community class.
      Parameters:
      communityName - The name of the community from which to delete the product.
      productName - The name of the product to delete.
      Returns:
      true if the product is successfully deleted from the community's inventory, false otherwise (community not found or product not in inventory).

    • queryCommunityByDepartment

      public String queryCommunityByDepartment(int departmentCode)
      Description: Retrieves a list of communities in a specified department according to the BioPlace they belong to. pre: A Community object must be linked with a BioPlace object in order to show the list.
      Parameters:
      departmentCode - The code representing the department (1 for Choco, 2 for Valle del Cauca, 3 for Cauca, 4 for Narino).
      Returns:
      A string containing the names of communities in the specified department, or an error message if the department code is invalid.

    • searchCommunity

      public Community searchCommunity(String communityName)
      Description: Searches for a community by its name.
      Parameters:
      communityName - The name of the community to search for.
      Returns:
      The Community object representing the found community, or null if not found.

    • registerBioPlace

      public boolean registerBioPlace(String placeName, int department, double area, int placeType, String openingDate, String photo, double resources, String communityName)
      Description: Registers a new biological place with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      placeName - The name of the biological place.
      department - The department where the place is located (1 for Choco, 2 for Valle del Cauca, 3 for Cauca, 4 for Narino).
      area - The area of the place in square kilometers.
      placeType - The type of the place (1 for protected area, 2 for national park, 3 for private area).
      openingDate - The opening date of the place in the format dd-mm-yyyy.
      photo - The photo URL of the place.
      resources - The economic resources needed for habitat care.
      communityName - The name of the community associated with the place.
      Returns:
      true if the place is successfully registered, false if the place already exists or storage is full.

    • registerSpeciesToBioPlace

      public boolean registerSpeciesToBioPlace(String placeName, String speciesName, int kingdom, String photo, int specimens)
      Description: Registers a species to a biological place.
      Parameters:
      placeName - The name of the biological place to which the species will be registered.
      speciesName - The name of the species to register.
      kingdom - The kingdom of the species (1 for flora, 2 for fauna).
      photo - The photo URL of the species.
      specimens - The number of specimens of the species.
      Returns:
      true if the species is successfully registered to the biological place, false otherwise (place not found).

    • modifySpeciesOfBioPlace

      public boolean modifySpeciesOfBioPlace(String placeName, String speciesName, Kingdom newKingdom, String newPhoto, int newSpecimens)
      Description: Modifies a species in a biological place.
      Parameters:
      placeName - The name of the biological place where the species is located.
      speciesName - The name of the species to modify.
      newKingdom - The new kingdom of the species.
      newPhoto - The new photo URL of the species.
      newSpecimens - The new number of specimens of the species.
      Returns:
      true if the species is successfully modified, false otherwise (place or species not found).

    • searchBioPlace

      public BioPlace searchBioPlace(String placeName)
      Description: Searches for a biological place by its name.
      Parameters:
      placeName - The name of the biological place to search for.
      Returns:
      The BioPlace object representing the found biological place, or null if not found.

    • consultCommunitiesMajorIssuesHospOrEdu

      public List<String> consultCommunitiesMajorIssuesHospOrEdu()
      Description: Consults communities with major issues related to absence of hospitals or lack of education services.
      Returns:
      A list of community names that have major issues related to absence of hospitals or lack of education services.

    • consultBioPlaceWithMoreSpecies

      public void consultBioPlaceWithMoreSpecies()
      Description: Consults the biological place with the most species. pos:Prints the name of the place and the number of species it has. Prints a message if no biological places are found or if there is insufficient data.

    • consultTheThreeLargestPlacesByKm2

      public void consultTheThreeLargestPlacesByKm2()
      Description: Consults the three largest places by area in square kilometers (Km^2). pos: Prints the names and areas of the three largest places if data is available. Prints a message if there are no places to consult or insufficient data.

    • getCommunitiesByDepartment

      public List<String> getCommunitiesByDepartment(Department department)
      Description: Retrieves a list of communities in a specified department according to the BioPlace they belong to. pre: A Community object must be linked with a BioPlace object in order to show the list.
      Parameters:
      department - department The object code representing the department (1 for Choco, 2 for Valle del Cauca, 3 for Cauca, 4 for Narino).
      Returns:
      A string containing the names of communities in the specified department, or an error message if the department code is invalid.

      Returns:
